entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Baie-Comeau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:05 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -26.6°C

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
